SEARCH
Package edu.aau.g404.core.action

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
ColorAction, DimmingAction, OnAction
public interface Action
Action interface for defining the actions to be performed on SmartLight devices. Provides methods to execute an action and create a SmartLight instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default SmartLight
    createSmartLightInstance(LightController lightController)
    Create a new SmartLight instance using the LightController implementation.
    void
    execute(LightController lightController, String identifier)
    Execute the action on the SmartLight with the specified identifier.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(LightController lightController, String identifier)
      Execute the action on the SmartLight with the specified identifier.
      Parameters:
      lightController - The LightController implementation for the SmartLight.
      identifier - The unique identifier of the SmartLight to be updated.

    • createSmartLightInstance

      default SmartLight createSmartLightInstance(LightController lightController)
      Create a new SmartLight instance using the LightController implementation.
      Parameters:
      lightController - The LightController implementation for the SmartLight.
      Returns:
      The new SmartLight instance.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an error occurs during SmartLight instantiation.
